* Jan 26, Morning (RTM-ROS setup)

http://code.google.com/p/rtm-ros-robotics/wiki/ROS_English#Setup_Eclipse

- rosrun openhrp3 rtsysedit.sh

-- press right button, and select "Add Name Server"

-- enter RTM name server (192.168.128.14, for example)

-- press ON button upper the eclipse

- start gui.sh

- rosmake hrpsys_ros_bridge --rosdep-install --rosdep-yes


* Jan 26, Afternoon (move real robot)

$ roslaunch hironx_ros_bridge hironx.launch

You can view the robot state in rviz.

In another terminal,

$ roscd hironx_ros_bridge/scripts

$ rosrun roseus roseus kawada-hironx-sample.l
